pr_title: Issue #7567: Adding code examples for default configuration of MethodNameCheck

timeline.bodyText:
You had to put code example for default configuration.
The default configuration is one without any other property.
This is not the default configuration since it has format property being explicitly written.
This is the default config:
<module name="MethodName"/>

Take help from here: https://checkstyle.sourceforge.io/config_naming.html#MethodName
See what are the default values for each property and then make some code examples accordingly.
timeline.author: Abhishek-kumar09

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java index f0a637fc5..04e0187a3 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java @@ -137,25 +148,6 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.AnnotationUtil; * } * *

- * An example of the default configuration for all methods: - *

- * 
- * <module name="MethodName">
- *    <property name="format" value="^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$"/>
- * </module>
- *
- *

Code Example:

- * 
- * class MyClass {
- *   public void first_Method1() {} // OK
- *   protected void second_Method2() {} // OK
- *   private void Third_Method3() {} // violation, name 'ThirdMethod' must match
- *                                 // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
- *   void Fourth_Method4() {} // violation, name 'FourthMethod' must match
- *                          // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
- * }
- *
- *

* An example of how to suppress the check to public and protected methods: *

*

diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/ConstantNameCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/ConstantNameCheck.java index 3e1c9c29a..2e35fa996 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/ConstantNameCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/ConstantNameCheck.java @@ -64,6 +64,7 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.ScopeUtil; * 
  * <module name="ConstantName"/>
  *
+ * *

* The following configuration apart from names allowed by default allows {@code log} * or {@code logger}:

timeline.bodyText: If its an example of default config then write it below Line no. 85 in this file, since there you have to add code examples of default config.
timeline.author: Abhishek-kumar09
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -137,6 +137,25 @@ * } * *

+ * An example of the default configuration for all methods: + *

+ * 
+ * <module name="MethodName">
+ *    <property name="format" value="^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$"/>
+ * </module>
+ *
+ *

Code Example:

+ * 
+ * class MyClass {
+ *   public void first_Method1() {} // OK
+ *   protected void second_Method2() {} // OK
+ *   private void Third_Method3() {} // violation, name 'ThirdMethod' must match
+ *                                 // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
+ *   void Fourth_Method4() {} // violation, name 'FourthMethod' must match
+ *                          // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
+ * }
+ *
+ *

timeline.bodyText:
These names doesn't align to default MethodNameCheck.
Since underscore is not allowed in default config.
Use should only use CamelCasing for naming methods here.
timeline.author: Abhishek-kumar09
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,6 +83,17 @@ * 
  * <module name="MethodName"/>
  *
+ *

Code Example:

+ * 
+ * class MyClass {
+ *   public void first_Method1() {} // OK
+ *   protected void second_Method2() {} // OK
+ *   private void Third_Method3() {} // violation, name 'ThirdMethod' must match

diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java index 012022037..04e0187a3 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/MethodNameCheck.java @@ -86,12 +86,12 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.AnnotationUtil; *

Code Example:

* 
  * class MyClass {
- *   public void first_Method1() {} // OK
- *   protected void second_Method2() {} // OK
- *   private void Third_Method3() {} // violation, name 'ThirdMethod' must match
- *                                 // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
- *   void Fourth_Method4() {} // violation, name 'FourthMethod' must match
- *                          // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
+ *   public void firstMethod1() {} // OK
+ *   protected void secondMethod() {} // OK
+ *   private void ThirdMethod() {} // violation, method name must match to the
+ *                                 // default pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'
+ *   public void fourth_Method4() {} // violation, method name must match to the
+ *                                  // default pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'
  * }
  *
*

timeline.bodyText:
This is not the default pattern.
The default pattern is:
"^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"
timeline.author: Abhishek-kumar09
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,6 +83,17 @@ * 
  * <module name="MethodName"/>
  *
+ *

Code Example:

+ * class MyClass {
+ *   public void first_Method1() {} // OK
+ *   protected void second_Method2() {} // OK
+ *   private void Third_Method3() {} // violation, name 'ThirdMethod' must match
+ *                                 // pattern '^[a-z](_?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$'
